title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 30.5 - Addition and deletion of vehicles from fleet
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 30.5 - Addition and deletion of vehicles from fleet

State Regulations
(a) Vehicles may be added to the fleet at any
issuing office. The registrant will receive a permanent fleet registration
document and sticker and plates, if needed, for the added vehicle or
vehicles. (b) If a vehicle is
deleted from the fleet registration and the plates are not to be transferred to
another fleet vehicle in the same account, then the plates must be surrendered
at the issuing office or central point established by the Department of Motor

Vehicles. However, the registrant must maintain a list of vehicles from which
plates were surrendered for audit purposes. Plates cannot be transferred to a
nonfleet vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
30.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
